messages.message:
i'm not sure where to post this :sweat_smile:


@Heymian @peter @Xindi Xu @Jessica @sudeep it seems admin-diagnostics have been in preview for a long time. Are we planning to deprecate it?

A client needs to check Instabase's internal health for disaster recovery decisions. They used the API, but 'test_multipart_upload' test case keeps failing. However, all tests pass when run through the APP.

I tried on dogfood. Running it via the API, I also get 'test_multipart_upload' failed. I can't run via the app; it shows '404 Not Found: The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually, please check your spelling and try again.

from clients:

`Running through the Admin Diagnostics app via the UI, all 11 tests are shown to be passing.`
`I can also confirm the 1 failed test is persistent for the multi part uploads via the API.`
`Do you know what the roadmap is for these diagnostics APIs, when will they be promoted out of preview status?`
`Hi, Jet. Main reason of usage for this API - looking for the way to check instabase internal health before making a decision for DR. All infrastructure components already covered, but any proposals how to get instabase health status via existing API's are appreciated.`
Hi Jet, Heymian is out today but she should be able to answer this when she gets back next week. I'm pretty sure the plan is to promote it to production, not to deprecate it.
Yup, ideally we’d be able to spend some more time on it and promote to production!
We just haven’t been able to carve out the time for it
